article_title: As Karl Rove Waves White Flag On Obamacare, So Do GOP Governors

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: News that former George W. Bush White House advisor Karl Rove urged his fellow Republicans to abandon attempts to repeal the Affordable Care Act and focus on a replacement plan comes as thousands of Americans sign up for the law’s expanded Medicaid benefits for the poor thanks to changing hearts [...]
